Posts.Content: AnnJac - thank you!  I am going to forage in the freezer for some ice cream now as I’ve had 4 tubes of pasta today and rejected everything else.  I am literally looking in the cupboards for inspiration and closing the doors in despair.  Any idea how long this will last?  I have my next Docetaxel on 17th December so doing the maths it looks like I’ll be sucking on an ice cube for Christmas dinner!!
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Tigermum and pinklady -  I feel your distress!  My tastebuds have been missing in action since Friday.  I’ve had 3 x EC and one Docetaxel so far last Monday (26th).  Each time has had an effect on my tastebuds but this is horrendous - everything tastes like it has sweetener tipped all over it.  Some things taste bitter too.  I can’t even face water.  Cheese makes me heave and I love cheese.  Apart from that have had painful bones and am increasingly tired as chemos go on but am now missing food.  I can’t even enjoy my advent calendar.  It’s a cruel world!!!
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***
